Acting like a click would be true for any fraternity Amitabh Bachchan
Sometimes what happens is that you are restricted because procedure is legalBachchanSpeaksToArnab on film fraternitys reactions to cases
You dont want to say anything which could disrupt the case on film fraternitys reactions to cases
We have never ever gone against the law And whenever we have we have faced the consequencesBachchanSpeaksToArnab
Dont load every film personality celebrity with woes of countryWe arent accomplished to answer or bear burden
Our entire existence is based on contact which is picked up from public on disconnect with public in certain issues
I will not cross the line where the law is concerned
Has there ever been any effort from the media to find out about some of the other work that the film fraternity doesBachchanSpeaksToArnab
I have taken care of 50 families of farmers who committed suicide Thats not been mentioned anywhere
There are many of us who continue to do work like this independently
I found that a huge number of farmers were comitting suicides for amounts as small as 1000 20000 rupees
There may be truth in the fact that the film fraternity wants to be on the right side of politicians
I think were more concerned with our creative work Were more concerned about how we are going to face the cameraBachchanSpeaksToArnab
I am afraid of doing anything wrong for the fear that the power can make my life miserable BachchanSpeaksToArnab
Even today I am afraid of doing anything wrong for fear that the powers that be because are vulnerableBachchanSpeaksToArnab
The misery that we went through during the Bofors scam has taught me a lesson for life
I will teach that to every generation of mine  dont take on the establishment
Im not interested in taking up any kind of institution that may have wronged somewhere  which is disturbing my lifeBachchanSpeaksToArnab
Bofors was a nightmarish situation
Im not interested in taking up any kind of institution that may have wronged somewhere  which is disturbing my life
Negativity disturbed my creativity I didnt speak about the scam after winning case on Bofors
I was later informed that my name was planted in the scam on Bofors
When you compare us with another film industry or nation our circumstances are different
Not interested in taking on politician Wont take on the government
We do not want to be associated with anything that could become controversialBachchanSpeaksToArnab
If there is a law we have to respect the law on the beef ban
Personally feel that people dont want to get into controversyEventually your end product is going to get hurtBachchanSpeaksToArnab
When media offices are attacke it has the power to take them attackers on The media is very powerful
When media offices are attacked it has the power to take them attackers on The media is very powerful
I will admit that our family has been family friends with the Nehrus  the Gandhis
I will respect that friendship because i respect the association my parents had
But i realized soon after politics that I was not qualified for it and therefore I went away
I only have personal friendships with politicians Doesnt mean I am politically aligned with them
Ive always believed in lifethat once a friend always a friend for meBachchanSpeaksToArnab
Amar Singh has always been a friend and I will always respect him
What Amar Singh wishes to say about me is his prerogative I will not comment on it
Soon as Amar Singh was out of hospital I went and met him
There is no falling out with the Gandhis as far as i am concerned
After the end of 5 years he will be judged again Let those 5 years elapse then we will see on PM Modi
Where am I supporting modi I am only working for Gujarat tourism on PM Modi
When I work for state and culture I do not charge money I do it as a nationalBachchanSpeaksToArnab on associaiton with PM Modi
When I work for state and culture I do not charge money I do it as a nationalBachchanSpeaksToArnab on association with PM Modi
I am not in politics
Association with politicians is inevitableBachchanSpeaksToArnab
When you are in the kind of profession we are in its inevitable that youll be equated withdrawn with politicians
I am not qualified no where even near to these positions BachchanSpeaksToArnab about going for ceremonial positions in the governement
No political party has made overtures to me to campaign for them
I play the role I tend not to bring reality into my roles
I tend not to bring reality into my roles
I just perform the role and thats it The role remains in the studio afterwards
I like to keep a separation I just perform the role and thats it The role remains in the studio afterwards
No I never discussed politics with the Gandhis during the Emergency
Democracy was being curtailed the entire film industry itself was suffering on the 1975 Emergency
There were limitations to what you could show could print on 1975 Emergency
You were told action sequences must not exceed 90 ft on 1975 Emergency
Thats like curbing creativity on 1975 Emergency
Whatever happened in 1984 was terrible and it should never have happenedBachchanSpeaksToArnab on the 1984 Sikh riots
But to say that I was responsible for it is just a lot of rubbishBachchanSpeaksToArnab on the 1984 Sikh riots
I dont want to put my finger into any controversial pie because I think I have had enough of it
No I never spoke to Rajiv Gandhi regarding the 1984 Sikh riots
The kind of connect the audience has had with the film is the reason why Piku has perhaps reached the distance it hasBachchanSpeaksToArnab
I think that audience connect has been more worthy than the compliments for performance on the success of Piku
An audiences connect with a films more important than saying you know your performance was good or whatever it is
I think that connect has been more worthy than the compliments for performance
Whenever I see the younger generation do something good I send them some flowers  write a note to themBachchanSpeaksToArnab
When an actor plays beyond any recognition associated with temperament his characteristicsits a huge achievement
Which is why I appreciated Kangana Ranaut for her filmBachchanSpeaksToArnab on Ranauts perfomance in
Working for me is a necessity I am insecure financially  therefore I need to keep working as there were debts on meBachchanSpeaksToArnab
The very people that used to virtually touch your feet embrace you were the very people who came and abused youBachchanSpeaksToArnab
I am really indebted to people of the country because they have stayed with me  continue to see some of my filmsBachchanSpeaksToArnab
